      • getExit

        public Room getExit​(java.lang.String pDirection)
        As TransporterRoom is a sort of Room, we Override its exit so we don't have to change our initial conditions inside goRoom method
        Overrides:
        getExit in class Room
        Parameters:
        pDirection - The given direction we want to get the exit of
        Returns:
        The exit that was found from the given pDirection

        public void setAlea​(java.lang.String pString)

        Parameters:
        pString - The Rooms's name you want to be teleported to
